name: Dread Chess
description:
Dread Chess is an experimental game in which you can set non-symmetrical rules for players and watch the computer play itself to death.

The God of Madness plays chess to create fates that will find themselves in the lives of their accidental owners. Setting up random rules time after time for your own pleasure and pain of living.

Roles

  • Card - Offered a choose from several moves. Moves are not random and always consist of three options bad, average and good. Which one to choose is up to yourself.
  • Dice - An old gambling version of dice chess, players roll a die and have to move a piece that fell on it. A move must be made and not always a good one.
  • Direct - Classic chess, any available moves can be made.

The game is a rework of ai chess
